data.title: Middle East Media Outlets
data.meta_description: EGYPT Al-Ahram Weekly :  Government newspaper. AllAfrica.com: Egypt : News reports from African sources. Egypt Commercial News : Business news from CNP Hub Corporation (based in UAE). Egypt Daily...
data.text:
EGYPT

Al-Ahram Weekly: Government newspaper.

AllAfrica.com: Egypt: News reports from African sources.

Egypt Commercial News: Business news from CNP Hub Corporation (based in UAE).

Egypt Daily News: Provides aggregated news from various sources.

Egypt Independent: Political, economic, social, and culture news.

Egyptian Streets: Independent news media organization.

Egypt Today: Leading current affairs magazine.

Ikhwanweb: London-based official website of the Muslim Brotherhood.

Mada Masr: Independent online newspaper.

Middle East News Agency (MENA): Subscription-only news agency.

Nile TV International: State-owned television channel.

State Information Service: Features official news stories and Cairo press review.

Watani: Weekly paper and an online news site focusing on Coptic issues.

GULF STATES

Bahrain

24x7 News: 24/7 economic and social news.

Bahrain Business News: Business news from CNP Hub Corporation (based in UAE).

Bahrain News: regional and international news.

Bahrain This Month: Entertainment and lifestyle magazine.

Bahrain News Agency (BNA): Official daily news.

Biz Bahrain: Online business news magazine.

Daily Tribune: Daily information on local issues, politics, business, and sports news.

Gulf Daily News: Semi-official newspaper.

Gulf Weekly: Weekly newspaper covering local news, business, and sports.

Ministry of Information

Voice of Bahrain: News and information on the GCC (Gulf Cooperation Council).

Time Out Bahrain: Guide to life in Bahrain.

Kuwait

Arab Times: Largest newspaper in Kuwait.

KUNA: Official Kuwait news agency.

Kuwait Daily News: Business news from CNP Hub Corporation (based in UAE).

Kuwait Times: English language daily newspaper.

Times Kuwait: Weekly news magazine.

Oman

Business Today: Monthly business magazine.

Muscat Daily: Largest-selling English daily.

Oman Bulletin: Business and other news from CNP Hub Corporation (based in UAE).

Oman Economic Review: Leading business publication.

Oman Ministry of Information: Country information and local news links to ministries and government organizations.

Oman News Agency (ONA): Official news service.

Oman Tribune: Newspaper providing daily local and regional news.

Oman TV

Times of Oman: Government-controlled, major English-language newspaper.

Week, The: Weekly tabloid, distributed free.

Qatar

Al Jazeera: English language site of Doha-based pan-Arabian TV broadcaster.

BQ Magazine: Monthly magazine covering business and economic news on Qatar and the GCC.

Doga Insight: Business news from CNP Hub Corporation (based in UAE).

Doha News: Digital news service.

Gulf Times: Business, sport, entertainment, and travel news.

Gulf-Times: English newspaper.

NRI Cafe: Leading source of news and information for Indians in Qatar.

Peninsula: English daily newspaper.

Qatar Gulf News: the Middle East daily news portal operating from Qatar.

Qatar Ministry Of Foreign Affairs: General country and tourism information and info on visa regulations.

Qatar Tribune: Daily newspaper.

Saudi Arabia

Arab News: Government-controlled newspaper.

Economist - Saudi Arabia: Provides political and economic forecast, factsheet, economic data, etc.

Eye of Riyadh: Provides information on events, training courses, job search, and local news.

Saudi Arabia Information Resource: Official country information and press releases from the Ministry of Information.

Saudi Daily Record: Business news from CNP Hub Corporation (based in UAE).

Saudi Gazette: English daily newspaper.

Saudi Press Agency (SPA): State news agency.

Saudia Online: News and information portal.

United Arab Emirates

7days: Daily newspaper providing local and regional news, metro life, business, and sports stories.

Al Arabiya: Middle East broadcaster and news site based in Dubai.

Arabian Business: Daily Middle East resource for business, financial & industry news. Also features a review of Middle East newspapers.

CPI Dubai: IT news portal.

Dubai Chronicle: Daily newspaper focusing on business issues in UAE and other regional countries.

Emirates Business 24/7: Daily newspaper.

Emirates News Agency (WAM): Official news service.

Gulf News: Business-oriented daily newspaper.

Gulf Today: Daily newspaper.

Khaleej Times: English newspaper.

Kipp Report: Dubai-based online Middle East business magazine updated throughout the day.

Maktoob Business: Provides the latest business and financial news from UAE, Middle East, and South Asia.

The National, Abu Dhabi-based English newspaper

Mina Al-Oraibi, Editor-In-Chief

Sport 360: Daily sports coverage.

Time Out Dubai: Complete Dubai city Information.

Xpress: Daily tabloid.

IRAN

AhlulBayt News Agency (ABNA): Daily news wire for Muslim Shi'a.

Alalam News Network: Tehran-based government-controlled international news channel.

CHN News Agency: Cultural Heritage News Agency covers culture and cultural heritage news.

Ettela'at Newspaper: International Persian daily newspaper.

Fars News Agency: Semi-official news service.

Financial Tribune: Economic news daily.

International Quran News Agency (IQNA): First and only specialized Quran news agency in the Islamic world.

Iran Book News Agency (IBNA): IBNA is a news agency focusing on books.

Iran Bulletin: Journal focused on a democratic, secular and socialist perspective.

Iran Daily: Daily newspaper published by the official news agency.

Iran Diplomacy: Foreign affairs related news.

Iran Focus: Independent non-profit news service provider.

Iran Front Page: Publishing English translation of select items from the Iranian newspapers and magazines.

Iran Herald: Issues, news from local & global sources.

Iran News Daily: Daily newspaper providing domestic and international news.

Iran Primer: Published by United States Institute of Peace.

Iran Project: News website.

Iran Review: Independent political, economic, social, and cultural bulletin.

Iran Times: Opposition edition of the weekly newspaper published in the US.

Iran va Jahan: Stories from the world newspapers and other media.

Iranian Labour News Agency (ILNA): News related to the labor market.

Iranian Magazine: Lifestyle, arts, history, and politics. Aimed for the diaspora.

Iranian Students News Agency (ISNA): Provides political, business cultural news.

IRIB - Islamic Republic of Iran Broadcasting: Daily news stories from the official broadcaster.

IRNA - Islamic Republic News Agency: Official news service.

Jam-e-Jam Online: Online newspaper.

Javanan: publication printed in Los Angeles and distributed worldwide.

Kayhan International: Conservative newspaper published in Tehran.

Khabar Online News Agency: Political, cultural, and economic news.

Mehr News Agency (MNA): Private and non-official media, providing economic, political, social, international, sports, cultural and religious news.

MEMRI: Iran: Site of Middle East Media Research Institute providing translations of Arabic and Farsi media reports.

Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Official website of the Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

Moj News Agency: Established in line with the activities of Moj Cultural Institute.

Petroenergy Information Network (Shana): National and international developments in the energy sector.

Payvand: Independent website was established in the US (California).

Press TV: Government-run international news network broadcasting in English.

SHAFAQNA: International Shia news association.

Tasnim News Agency: Media news for the Iranian Islamic Revolution.

Tehran Bureau: An independent online news magazine hosted by the Guardian.

Tehran Times: English daily newspaper.

Young Journalists Club: News written by young journalists.

IRAQ

Al Bawaba: Middle east and Iraq news from independent media.

Alsumaria TV: Lebanon-based Iraqi Satellite TV Network.

Baghdad Post: the Middle East and Iraqi news.

Institute for War and Peace Reporting: Independent media.

Iraq Directory: Guide to Iraq business.

Iraq Energy: Energy news website.

Iraq Oil Report, News and insight into Iraq's oil sector. Twitter: @IraqOilReport

Iraq Sun: Provide local and international news. produced by Midwest Radio Network from Sydney, Australia.

Iraqi Business News: Business news including oil & gas and investment & finance.

IRAQI DINAR: All news concerning the current events related to the Iraqi Dinar.

Iraqi News: Provides news and editorials.

KirkukNow, Independent media that covers the disputed areas in Iraq. Twitter: @Kirkuknow_DT

Mera J Bakr, English Editor

National Iraqi News Agency (NINA): Independent news agency.

Rudaw, current news, is based in the Kurdistan Region of Iraq.

​Fazel Hawramy, Investigative reporter

Lawk Ghafuri, Journalist

SHAFAQ news: News site.

ISRAEL-PALESTINE

Israel

AL-Monitor: Left-leaning news from the Israel section of Middle East news portal Al Monitor.

Arutz Sheva: News service presenting the viewpoint of hardliners.

Bicom: Britain Israel Communications and Research Centre.

B'Tselem: Information center for human rights in the occupied territories.

Challenge: Bi-monthly leftist magazine focusing on the Israeli-Palestinian conflict and published in Jaffa by Arabs and Jews.

Committee for Accuracy in Middle East Reporting in America (CAMERA): US-based media-monitoring organization battling "anti-Israeli bias in the media."

Daily Alert: Team of expert analysts who published timely news on Israel, the Middle East, and U.S. policy.

DEBKAfile: Right-wing site devoted to analyzing terrorism, intelligence, military affairs, and politics.

Emet News Service: Weekly summary of news and events.

Esra Magazine: Magazine of English Speaking Residents Association (ESRA).

Globes: English version of the business newspaper.

Ha'aretz: Daily newspaper with a broadly liberal outlook on domestic issues and international affairs.

HonestReporting.com: Website monitoring negative media coverage of Israel.

ILTV: Daily Newscast.

Independent Media Review Analysis (IMRA): News reports from the Arab and Israeli newspapers.

Intelligence & Terrorism Information Center: Focuses on issues concerning intelligence and terrorism.

Isracast: Independent multimedia broadcast and distribution network that focuses on foreign affairs and defense issues.

IsraelAM: Daily email newsletter summarizing Hebrew and English press news.

Israel Behind The News: Presents news items and analyses "that you often do not see in your mainstream media, even if you live in the Middle East."

Israel Defense Forces (IDF): Official site of the Israeli Defense Forces.

Israel Hayom: Online version of the national daily newspaper.

Israel Hasbara Committee: Website.

Israel Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Government-run portal.

Israel News Agency: Government wire service.

Israel Today: Jerusalem-based news agency.

I24news: International television channel located in Tel Aviv.

Jerusalem Online: News website.

Jerusalem Post: Right-of-center newspaper.

Jewish Currents: Web site for Quarterly print magazine.

Jewish Telegraphic Agency (JTA): News wire.

Jewish World Review: Conservative magazine of culture, politics, and religion.

Middle East Newsline: Regional news service. Reports military relations with its neighbors.

Palestine-Israel Journal: Independent magazine.

Rabbis For Human Rights: Rabbinic voice of conscience in Israel.

Reka: English news headlines from Kol Israel Radio Station.

Times of Israel: Newspaper.

Virtual Jerusalem: News and information website.

Ynetnews: English website of Ynet.

Palestine

Alternative Information Center (AIC): Activist organization striving to provide balanced news analysis.

AMIN - Arabic Media Information Network: News wire.

Electronic Intifada: News and information portal.

Friends of Al-Aqsa: UK-based human rights organization.

International Middle East Media Center (IMEMC): Independent daily news service.

Jerusalem Media & Communication Centre: Provides translations of Palestinian newspapers.

Ma'an news agency: News service. Published by a non-profit media organization Ma'an Network.

MIFTAH: Site of the Palestinian Initiative for the Promotion of Global Dialogue and Democracy. News from PLO perspective.

Palestine Chronicle: US-based online newspaper providing news and commentary.

Palestine News Network (PNN): News service.

Palestine Solidarity Campaign: Site of UK activist NGO.

Palestinian Information Center: Pro-Hamas news coverage.

WAFA: Official Palestinian news agency.

LEBANON

Alahednews: Regional and international news.

Al-Manar TV: Beirut-based pro-Hezbollah media.

Beirut Business Report: Lebanon business news from CNP Hub Corporation (based in UAE).

Beirut Night Life: Entertainment news.

Daily Star, The Daily English newspaper.

Executive: Monthly business magazine.

LBCI (Lebanese Broadcasting Corporation International): Private television station.

Naharnet: News and information portal.

NNA - National News Agency: State-run news service.

Now Lebanon: Independent news web portal.

The 961: Popular blog.

United Australian Lebanese Movement: Features news and organization information.

Ya Libnan: News on arts, culture, and current events.

SYRIA

ARA News: Pro-Kurdish press agency.

Enab Baladi: Nonprofit media organization.

Orient Net: Independent online newspaper. Based in Dubai.

Qasion News Agency: Local and international news daily.

RFS (Revolutionary Forces of Syria Media Office): News and reports by Revolutionary Forces of Syria.

SANA (Syrian Arab News Agency): Pro-government news agency.

Syrian Observatory for Human Rights: Documenting human rights.

Syrian Observer: Political and civil society news.

Syrian Network for Human Rights: Documents human rights violations>

Syria Deeply: Independent website.

Syria Direct: News on military developments.

Syria Report: Paris-based independent newspaper.

Syria Times: Official daily e-newspaper affiliated to the Ministry of Information.

Zaman Al Wasl: An independent electronic newspaper.

​

YEMEN

Al Sahwa: Sanaa-based daily newspaper.

Almotamar: Yemeni online newspaper published by pro-government General People Congress (GPC).

National Yemen: Daily political and economic news.

Shabab Yemeni: Independent newsletter for youth.

Yemen News Agency (Saba): Official news service.

Yemen Observer: Weekly newspaper.

Yemen Online: Independent newspaper covering political and economic news.

Yemen Post: English newspaper.

Yemen Times: English newspaper.

MIDDLE EAST REGIONAL MEDIA

Al Arabiya: Middle East broadcaster and news site based in Dubai.

Al Jadid: US-based cultural magazine.

Al Jazeera: English sitQatar-based based pan-Arabian TV broadcaster.

Al Masdar News: News and analysis from the Arab world. Based in Beirut.

Al Bawaba: Regional news portal.

Al-Monitor: Provides reporting and analysis from and about the Middle East.

AME Info: Business news and stories.

ArabianBusiness.com: Regional business, financial, and industry news.

Arabian Gazette: Online news portal based in Dubai.

Arabian Oil and Gas: Middle East energy news portal.

The Arabic Network for Human Rights Information: Egypt-based non-governmental organization promoting freedom of expression.

Asharq Alawsat: Pan-Arab daily international newspaper.

Business Intelligence Middle East: Business portal for the Middle East region.

ITP.net: Middle East's leading technology site, offering daily IT and business news.

Great Middle East: Information and online analytical portal.

Kipp Report: Dubai-based online business magazine.

Marcopolis: International online publishing company based in Paris, France.

Media Line: News site.

MEED: Delivering business information and news, intelligence, and analysis.

Menafn.com: Middle east and north Africa financial network based in Jordan.

MENA Herald: Business news portal based in the UAE.

MER - Mid East Realities: News analysis.

Middle East Eye: Qatar-funded newspaper based in London.

Middle East Forum: Neo-conservatives' think tank dedicated to promoting US interests in the Middle East. Publishes Middle East Quarterly.

Middle East Monitor: Independent media research institution based in London.

Middle East Research and Information Project (MERIP): Washington-based publisher of the Middle East Report Magazine.

Middle East Review of International Affairs (MERIA): Published by Israel-based Global Research in International Affairs (GLORIA) Center.

Middle East Times: Arab newspaper published in Sydney.

Middle East Transparent: Paris-based progressive site covering human rights.

Mosaic News: Daily compilation of television news reports from the Middle East.

Trade Arabia: Portal for business news and information.

Washington Report on Middle East Affairs: Information concerning U.S. relations with Middle Eastern states.

Your Middle East: Independent digital newspaper.

Zawya.com: Business and finance news.

MIDDLE EAST CORRESPONDENTS

Associated Press

Samya Kullab, rIraqCorrespondent

Reuters

Samia Nakhoul, Middle East Editor

Washington Post

Mustafa Salim, Baghdad Bureau
